NewsArticle.Title: Skill/Spell Leveling Bonus & 50% Bonus Exp Event
NewsArticle.Content: Skill/Spell Leveling Bonus & 50% Bonus Exp Event Starting November 21st, all registered characters will receive DOUBLE the leveling rate of Skills and Spells. Using the leveling bonus item from the itemshop will QUADRUPLE the rate!!! Registered accounts will also receive 50% Extra Experience gained through monster kills, quest rewards, etc. ((This event will begin on November 21st and END on November 26th. Register your accounts to take advantage of this special event!))
